name: Portal Clone
description:
Simple Portal game clone created with Unity Engine as an assignment for the 3D Video Game Development subject of Tecnocampus University.

The goal is to solve the different puzzles using the portal gun.

Controls
WASD to move around
E to pick-up and leave objects
Mouse to aim
Mouse Left-Click to shoot a blue portal and throw picked objects
Mouse Right-Click to shoot an orange portal
Mouse Scroll wheel to scale blue portals

Disclaimer
We do not own any of the visual assets from the game.

Created by Pau Sánchez Cairó and Josep Franqueza Martí
